fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM PAPERWORK
fields.Description: checking out some of kim's official paperwork on his room desk
fields.Placement: on the table, the outline around some papers on the table in kim's room

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "He went with the 'Furies'. Perhaps..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He went with the 'Furies'. Perhaps the internal strife it implies was not so off after all? Or perhaps to honour your wishes? Or for some other reason. Hard to say...

fields.Title: Cuno: "The boy picks up the notes and shuf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The boy picks up the notes and shuffles through some of the case names: "'The Child', 'Dom's Unfinished', 'Dom's Unfinished 2', 'The Man With the Hole in His Head'... Boring ass shit," he concludes.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, Kim is such a binoclard.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, Kim is such a binoclard."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I had Garte open the door to your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I had Garte open the door to your room." He closes the notes. "You were running a low bacterial fever the first night."

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "These are fragments of the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These are fragments of the lieutenant's paperwork, left unfinished. Notes on this and other recent cases.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""To inquire about the Lieutenant-Ye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To inquire about the Lieutenant-Yefreitor, sir. I am his partner," says Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare, standing in the doorway.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Pig..." he says with a frown. "It'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pig..." he says with a frown. "It's cool for Cuno to rip on the 'clard, but he took a bullet for you. You gonna shitmouth Cuno too if he falls in battle?"

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you for keeping this... thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for keeping this... thing alive a little longer." (Point to yourself.)

fields.Title: You: "What is the name?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is the name?

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "HDB41-0803 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: HDB41-0803 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: HDB41-0803 (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "KK57-0803-0815 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: KK57-0803-0815 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: KK57-0803-0815  (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am sure neither of us feels soli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sure neither of us feels solid enough to keep loitering in this room -- let's go."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Why are you here?" asks the man as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you here?" asks the man as the cough fit resides. His eyes are black and moist.

fields.Title: Cuno: "The boy hesitates for a moment, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The boy hesitates for a moment, then nods. "No one tells Cuno what to call something, but the bino was alright in Cuno's book." He taps his chest solemnly. "Cuno's pig."

fields.Title: You: ""I saw... apocalyptic visions. Of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I saw... apocalyptic visions. Of the darkness... behind darkness... *behind* darkness..."

fields.Title: You: ""Look, Cuno, Lieutenant Kitsuragi's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, Cuno, Lieutenant Kitsuragi's notes."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""For you, maybe," he replies seriou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For you, maybe," he replies seriously. "But take it from the Cunn: Binos don't always get that. They get their feelings hurt. Cuno doesn't want this for your pal. He's alright in Cuno's book."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm such a burden. I should just f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm such a burden. I should just fuck off..."

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "HDB41-0803.1015 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: HDB41-0803.1015 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: HDB41-0803.1015 (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "This year, you can see references t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This year, you can see references to: THE CHILD, DOM'S UNFINISHED; DOM'S UNFINISHED 2, MOTORCYCLE EMPTINESS, and THE MAN WITH THE HOLE IN HIS HEAD.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not this again... you pull your we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not this again... you pull your weight, okay?" He waves you off. "Let's go."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would have been easy were it no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It would have been easy were it not for my concussion... We both got lucky, considering the odds we faced." There's a pause. "Let's go?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Oh... 'Motorcycle Emptiness' -- th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh... 'Motorcycle Emptiness' -- that's a cool case. Cuno can solve that shit for the bino."

fields.Title: You: ""I thought I was dead for a moment.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought I was dead for a moment."

fields.Title: You: "What has he written -- on *this* ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What has he written -- on *this* case?

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "HDB41-0803.1111 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: HDB41-0803.1111 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: HDB41-0803.1111 (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "On his right hand side -- a little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On his right hand side -- a little blue notebook. Open at case notes...

fields.Title: You: ""It just good-humoured banter among..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It just good-humoured banter among friends."

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "These papers bear the stamp of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These papers bear the stamp of the RCM. They appear to be fragments of the lieutenant's paperwork, half-finished. You make out notes on this -- and other recent cases.

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "Half a dozen stolen property cases..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Half a dozen stolen property cases titled CROSSWORD PUZZLES 2-2000.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Back there, on the plaza? I think..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back there, on the plaza? I think you very nearly had a heart attack. Alcoholism has damaged you more than bullets have..." There's a small pause. "We should go."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Then why are you wasting time here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then why are you wasting time here?" coughs Kim. "He's out there. In Martinaise. Unsupervised, *without cover*. You need to get there..." His cough gets the best of him, he grabs a glass.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... behind darkness, I get it. Let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... behind darkness, I get it. Let's go."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Twenty-eight kilometres to the nort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Twenty-eight kilometres to the northeast, in the infirmary of Precinct 57, Lieutenant Kim 'Pinball' Kitsuragi rests under a heart monitor. A triage sign coloured yellow hangs from his injury record -- safe, it means. He coughs, propped up against the pillow.

fields.Title: You: "What about the other cases? What do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What about the other cases? What do we have here...

fields.Title: You: "[Close the notes.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Close the notes.]

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "HDB41-0803.1300 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: HDB41-0803.1300 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: HDB41-0803.1300 (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "KK57-0803-0815 (THE HANGED MAN)"
fields.Dialogue Text: KK57-0803-0815 (THE HANGED MAN)
fields.Alternate1: KK57-0803-0815 (THE FURIES ARE AT HOME IN THE MIRROR)

fields.Title: You: ""Don't call him a *bino*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't call him a *bino*."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's right, you know? The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right, you know? The lieutenant probably doesn't enjoy being called a binoclard -- the four-eyed dork.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Back there, on the plaza? I think..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back there, on the plaza? I think you very nearly had another heart attack. Alcoholism has damaged you more than bullets have..." There's a small pause. "We should go."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, I shouldn't call him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, I shouldn't call him that."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""That's cold, Pig. Sub-zero. Cuno a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's cold, Pig. Sub-zero. Cuno ain't like that. Cuno's got heart." He looks at the notes. "You're done with these or...?"

fields.Title: You: "Anything more?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Anything more?

fields.Title: You: ""I call it like I see it, Cuno.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I call it like I see it, Cuno."

fields.Title: Cuno: "He nods approvingly. "Now, let's ge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods approvingly. "Now, let's get a move on, pig. Cuno's itching to crack this case."

fields.Title: Half-Finished Paperwork: "Very little. This is a daily write-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Very little. This is a daily write-up. He's just started copying notes from his notebook, preparing them for filing. The case appears to be named, however.
